11.title: Lilo&Stitch

111.content:
As time passes Lilo started to lose interest in taking photos of large, overweight people all over her hometown. Just when she thought she would have no more hobbies something caught her interest.

She became entranced by the beauty of large pregnant bellies. The fascination shape and size a woman’s belly can grow from having life forming inside it made her become obsessed with taking photos of every pregnant woman she can find. After looking through many photos she wonders what it would be to touch and rub a pregnant belly without having to touch a random stranger and causing a scene. She would love Nani to have a belly, but she knows that Nani and David’s relationship has not gone that far to have a kid. She wonders herself having a belly herself, but she didn’t have a boyfriend to love like Keoni and have a baby of their own. Not like a baby will magically appear in her belly either. Saddened by her thoughts, she went to find Jumba as she could not find Stitch since he went somewhere on his own.

Lilo managed to find Jumba in the spaceship behind her house working on a machine. “Hey Jumba” she greeted him. “Ah little girl so nice to see you” he replied. “Did you need something?” “ No” she responded and said, “ just got bored since I don’t know where Stitch went.” “That’s fine little girl, just don’t touch or break anything” Jumba instructs Lilo before returning to his creation. She began looking around until she found a few interesting things she wanted to ask about.

The first was a strange gun like object with a needle at the end along with some glass tubes. “Jumba, what is this?” Jumba sees device and explains, “That is new device I want to use on experiments. It allows me to take DNA, like hair or fur, from one male experiment like 626 and a female like 624 and place inside female experiment and form new life and maybe stronger experiment.” He then gives evil laugh. Then Lilo asks, “Does it work only on the experiments?” Jumba replies, “Huh? Oh. No. Can work on any living creature and just needs both male and female DNA and needs to be inject in belly area.”

Lilo points to next item, which looks like a bottle full of strange pills, asking about and Jumba explains, “That is new medicine I made. It was designed to strengthen the abilities of experiments for a short amount of time. For the males it works quite well, but for the females there is slight side effect. It causes them to be pregnant without the need of male. Basically making clones in their bellies. This unfortunately can cause same effect on females of any species. So I need to store away as soon as I’m done with machine.”

Lilo pointed at final device and asks, “What about this?”. “That nothing special. Just raygun that stores whatever shot at inside ray gun inside until placed inside next thing shot by ray gun. Let me show you.” He places an ice cream scoop in front of them and fires a ray at it. The ice cream disappears and next he fires at Lilo right at her stomach. She expresses delight as she can feel the ice cream right in her stomach. “ Beats having to waste time licking it slowly. But still this device is useless except for faster consumption of food.” This gave Lilo and interesting idea. “What if you pointed the ray at a person and accidentally shot another person with it?” Jumba weirded out by that question answered, “In theory, that person would be transported inside the second person shot at. But that sounds really ridiculous. Who would want to do that?”. Jumba laughs hysterically while thought to herself how she can use that. Having a baby “magically” didn’t seem too far off now.

Lilo then asks, “Jumba, can I see what these things can -”. She is immediately stopped by Jumba when he says, “Stop right there little girl. Only evil scientists can use these and that’s final.” Frustrated by that answered she pouts and stays quiet the remainder of time. Then off in the distance Lilo and Jumba can hear Pleakely shouting for Jumba. “What does one eye weakling want now? I better go see. Do not touch anything.”

After a few seconds, Lilo was all alone with all those thing she got demonstrations of. You know that saying while the cats away the mice will play but in this case the docs away leaving Lilo to play with any of them to fill her pregnant belly desire.

Out of everything in front of her ...
111.title: Lilo

1111.content:
Since Jumba was gone, she decided to help herself with the syringe gun and glass tubes filled with the formula to make babies and quickly ran back to her room. Once there, she looked and remember what Jumba said on how the stuff works. She plucked a strand of hair from her head and said, “ he say it needed female DNA” while dropping the hair into the glass tube with the formula. The hair instantly dissolved and she was surprised how quick it was.

“Now I just need the male DNA” Lilo said knowing what to do next. The big question for her was where or to be more specific who she should get it from. After long thinking Lilo decided ...
1111.title: She takes formula and syringe

choices: Started to show a little bump
Grew large and round in a short amount of time
Shows no signs of change (delayed until bed time for belly to grow)
11111.content:
Stitch is her best friend and she thought if she wanted a baby from anyone it would most likely be him. Also, she thought it would be cool to have a half-human/half-alien baby hybrid as part of the family. It might sound weird to others but she didn’t care anymore about being called weird.

A few moments later she can hear scurrying on the walls in the living room which she believes is Stitch. She was right and sees Stitch right as she comes down from her room. “Where have you been?” she asks Stitch. He holds out a bags and cups while replying, “Coffee and coconut cake!”. She rolls her eyes while giving out a small laugh from his answer. “Of course, I should have known. Hey Stitch what is that behind you?” Stitch turned around confused and trying to figure out what she was talking about making it the perfect time for her to strike. She slowly comes behind him and plucked a few strands of fur from the back of his head. “Ogata” Stitch yells out and turns back to face Lilo. “Sorry. You had something stuck in the back of your head. Got it though” Lilo says trying to calm Stitch. He thanks her and decided to go find Jumba while Lilo goes back to her room to the device. She drops the strands of fur into the formula disappearing quickly as well. The formula started bubbling and changing colors until it subsided into a calm pink color. Thinking it was done she placed the glass tube into the syringe gun completing the experiment.

It was time for her to prepare herself to get impregnated. Once she was ready, she lifted up her shirt, grabbed the syringe gun, and started to place the syringe near the lower area of her belly. She took one final breath and said, “Big, round belly come to mama” as she injected the formula into her belly. Once finished, she felt funny as she can feel something traveling through the lower part of her body making her feel tingly until it finally reached its destination, her womb.

In that moment, life was beginning to form. In a few moments her belly ...
11111.title: Stitch

choices: She took photos with her belly growing slowly between each shot
She hears Stitch calling for her
111111.content:
Lilo could feel warmth coming from her womb and a in a few moments her belly started to form a little bump. She pulled up her shirt again to clearly see how much her body was changing. Much to her excitement of it growing, it stopped after a few seconds. If anyone were to look at her at the moment she looked a little bloated if anything. She became sad to why she isn’t bigger and then said, “ Maybe it takes a while before my belly grows really big”. She hides the syringe somewhere in her room and decided to become oblivious should the device be brought up.Soon after Nani started to yell out that lunch was ready and good thing since she was feeling hungrier than usual and thinking it was the life inside her to be the cause.

Nighttime arrived and Lilo was watching TV in the living room with Stitch until Nani came to tell the both of them it was time for bed. They both headed to their room until Stitch stopped with a worried look on his face. Lilo turned around asking, “What’s wrong Stitch?”. “Lilo okay?” He asked while she replied, “I’m fine. Why?”. He then pointed to her stomach and said, “Looks funny”. Panicking of his observation she quickly said, “Oh this. I think I ate too much today. Nothing to worry about.” She gave out a little cute burp to reassure that was the case. “See? That is why my belly is sticking out a bit? I won’t do that again. Promise.” “Hmm... okie-taka” Stitch says as he was fooled into believing that Lie Lilo made. They both were in the room, Lilo changes into her pajamas while hiding her belly, brushed their teeth, and finally said goodnight to each other before falling asleep.

All seem peaceful that night, but all will not be calm as changes were to occur. Lilo was facing or her front with her face in her pillow while she first started sleeping. Seconds later her, her belly was starting to grow again at a fast rate with it being the size compared to a softball. With its current size, it was starting to cause discomfort for Lilo forcing her to now lie on her back. Her belly still continued to grow and a circular shape was beginning to form under her blanket while Lilo was continuing to feel the changes making faces of discomfort. The growing finally stopped and Lilo returned to having a calm, smiling face returning to having pleasant dreams. With the new current size of her belly she looked like she swallowed a small bowling ball. Her last action before drifting into a deep sleep is she unconsciously started stroking her big belly.

Morning arrived and Lilo barely started to wake up being the last one to wake up. She looked to her to see Stitch gone, as usual, then looked in front of her as she was confused. At first she thought why somebody put a ball on top of her still sleepy from just waking up and after reaching for it and touching it left in a state of shock. She can feel her hands touching a part of her making her realize it was her belly. She removes her blanket to reveal the large dome of a belly and her pajamas were no longer able to cover over it. She couldn’t believe it at first until until one final action confirmed it which was a kick and movement coming from inside her belly. She became overjoyed that the experiment worked and she has a big belly now. She slowly got out of bed trying to get balance the weight between her and her belly. “Wow. My belly is really heavy now. Also, this will be really hard to hide now. She didn’t care a that moment thought as she has a huge belly now, at least for her size anyways. The first thing she did was starting to massage and feel her belly seeing how round it is. She got a bit of movement from the inside making her giggle filled with happiness. This lasted for a few minutes until she decided to stop and think of what to do next.

Then....
111111.title: Started to show a little bump

choices: Ask for Pleakley’s help finding new clothes
Find Stitch and tell the truth
1111111.content:
Now that she was had a big round belly, she could now take photos of herself. “Might as well take some now while I’m all alone” she said to herself. She arched her back to lift the weight of her belly and waddled to her camera lying on a shelf. Then she started to walk toward a large mirror she has in the room. She took a photo of her in front of the mirror in a front view while unknown to her that her belly grew a bit larger. She then posed to her side in front of the mirror taking another photo and again her belly grew a bit more. Her pajama shirt was beginning to get uncomfortable as her belly was growing so decided to take it off. With her belly fully exposed and showing signs of relief, she continued taking photos. Then a thought occurred to her, “I wonder how I look now with my hula outfit?” She started charging starting with the skirt then the cloth that goes around her chest. She noticed her chest has grown a like bit while putting it on,but not that noticeable so she ignored that fact. Finally putting the flowers on her head, she went towards the mirror and was amazed and said, “I look beautiful. Definitely need pictures of this.

During all her excitement and photo session, she failed to realize that her belly grew half it size compared to how it was early in the morning until now. “You’re getting big little fella. Are you doing okay in there?” and as her to think the child understood she got a few kicks which her smile. She took off her hula outfit and proceeded with putting on her sandals and iconic red shirt. Normally her red shirt was really big and would cover all of her to her feet, but with her large girth it was only able to cover to just barely below her knees. “Uh-oh. My shirt is a little small now. Gonna need to have some new clothes to wear that feel comfortable and in case it grows any bigger”.

She needed to considered her options on what to do. She could go to Pleakley to help buy maternity clothes and hopefully not tell Nani or Jumba about her current state. Another option would be to go to Jumba, even though he might get mad, and ask to make more comfortable clothing. Lastly, she could go to Stitch and tell the truth. Maybe after talking and getting his support, she can face Jumba much easier to ask for help. One thing for sure is she can’t have Nani find out what is going on or she might have a heart attack or even worse. She will tell Nani when the time is right and accepts her how she currently is.

After some long thinking Lilo decides to...
1111111.title: She took photos with her belly growing slowly b...

choices: Jumba and Stitch go inside Lilo’s body shrunk (Poxy episode) to her womb
A machine that works like an ultrasound but better he has stored in ship
11111113.content:
The child growing inside her is Stitch’s as well so she thought he should know as well. Even if he rejects the child she will do everything she can to take care of it but deep down she hopes she gets the opposite reaction and have him help take care of it like a family. She heads back down the elevator and heads to the hallway and she can immediately hear the scurrying like the day before knowing where Stitch is. Sure enough Lilo finds Stitch in the living room watching t.v. She sees him alone guessing the two other aliens where in their room or the ship while Nani must be at work making it the perfect opportunity to tell Stitch the truth. “Uhh... Stitch?” Lilo slowly says nervous to get Stitch’s attention. He does turn off the tv to see her and the first thing he sees is her large belly under her shirt. “Lilo! Dinko te fabba (You’re fat)”. Lilo blushes a bit and replies, “I’m not fat!” giving a small pause and continuing with, “Its something else”. Stitch concerned asks “Lilo okie-taka (okay)?”. Lilo takes a deep breath and explains, “I'm fine Stitch. I need to tell you something very important. The reason my belly is so big is because I have a baby growing inside and to do that needed some of your hair and used one of Jumba’s inventions”. Stitch has a blank expression clueless at what she’s trying to get at. “You’re the daddy Stitch”. “Meega (I’m) Daddy?” Stitch asks in which he gets a nod from Lilo. Stitch then laughs hysterically for a while to the point where it looked like he fainted. “Some strong alien. Can take a shot from a blaster and fight a giant alien at least twenty times his size but faints at the thought of being a father”.

Time passes and Stitch was beginning to come to and the first thing he notices is a heartbeat near him. He also notices whatever his head is laying on is soft and warm and gives a small squeeze. He then hears a voice, “Ouch! Watch the claws. You might hurt me and the baby”. Stitch opens his eyes, jumps up, and then looks behind him to see Lilo sitting on the floor with her large belly again and her legs spread where he assumes he was resting there with his head on her belly. “Did you have a nice nap?”. He nods and still focuses on her belly where was giving it rubs trying to accept the idea his kids are growing in her. “Kata... (May I)?”. Lilo replies, “Of course. How can I deny daddy to feel to get near his babies”. She lifts up her red shirt to reveal her bare belly as Stitch slowly gets closer. He decides to place a paw on her dome of a belly but not before retracting his claws. He gives it a few rubs then places one ear on it. Immediately he can hear a heartbeat going a bit fast making him think is that normal for one or could there possible be more. Just then he felt something hit his face coming from her belly. “Oh. The baby is kicking. Feel here Stitch”. Lilo guides his paw back on her belly and he does feel the movement inside. “Eegalgoo(Wow)!”. Lilo was happy to see him fascinated by the feeling of life within and now time to ask a serious question. “Stitch, do you think you can help me raise this baby as a family. This was my choice to do this to myself. So you don’t have to if you don’t want to”. Stitch yells out, “Ih(Yes)! Lilo and Stitch ohana”. Lilo sheds a tear of joy and tries to hug Stitch but was a little difficult with her round pregnant belly in the way. “Okay, now to tell Jumba the truth. Think you can help me Stitch?”. Stitch simply replies, “okie-taka(okay)”.

Stitch helps Lilo go up the steps leading to Jumba and Pleakley’s room where they can hear them both conversing with each other. Lilo started to breathe heavily being nervous until she felt her hand grabbed by Stitch’s. She calms down and says, “Okay Stitch lead the way”. Stitch opens the door with Lilo behind him where the two aliens notice them. “Ah 626, what is it?” asks Jumba. Stitich only says, “Lilo” and Jumba asks, “What about little girl?”. Lilo then stands right beside Stitch and shows both of them her large belly. “Oh my goodness! Lilo... what happened to you?!” screams Pleakley trying his best not to panic. “Well...”. Lilo then gives a full rundown of finding the invention, using it, the results, and finally telling Stitch. “I can’t believe my invention worked on other living creatures besides my experiments. That was only a theory. This is amazing”. Pleakley angrily stares at Jumba then says, “No this is not okay since Lilo is a little girl and from what I read humans don’t create offspring until at least adults. “Well she will be one of the few”. “Can’t you do something about this?” asks Pleakley. Jumba replies, “Well I could make something that would get rid of the offsprings before they are born but...”. Lilo immediately yells out, “No, please!” while Stitch beside her was snarling at the two of them. “I just gave it life so I can’t just take it away. And I'm sure I wouldn’t let anyone else make the decision either”. Stitch just follows with an “Ih” noise. “Are you sure about this Lilo?” asks Jumba waiting for her final answer in which she gives a nod. “Nani is not going to like this” says Pleakley with a little shakiness in his voice. “What else we can we do? This is little girl’s decision. It’s her body”. Lilo gave a sigh of relief on how they respected her decision. She looks at her belly more giving it a few rubs and then a thought came to her that she said out loud. “I wish we can see what the babies look like. Can’t go to a hospital and get all the attention so I guess that’s not possible”.

After Jumba gave it some thought he finally says, “There might actually be a way to see the babies”. Lilo eyes sparkled with excitement hearing that then saying, “Really, how?”. Then Jumba gives the options...



(Writer’s note: I don’t know if anyone was interested in seeing this continue but sorry for taking so long. Had my own stories to write and working on others as well. Trying to continue this some more and others are free to continue if they want)
11111113.title: Truth Time With Stitch

111111131.content:
“We could do what we did in order to capture 222 inside Pleakley”. Pleakley became shocked and replies, “You can’t be seriously considering entering Lilo’s body to see the babies just like they did when they entered my body?”. “Why not? I still have reducer and even modified it so that shrinkage can last as long as we want. No worry. 626 and I will use the x-buggy and we enter little girl and we can see the babies and new generation of experiments maybe”. Pleakley looking worried and needed to know something asks Lilo, “Lilo, you can’t possibly be agreeing to do this? It sounds dangerous and not worth it just to see your babies“. Lilo just looks down at her stretched shirt focusing on her belly giving it a few rubs thinking real hard on her thoughts and concerns. “I want to see them. If there is a way then I’ll take it. I want to see how they look”. Pleakley still hesitant and wanting to tell Nani respects Lilo’s decisions and goes along with the plan. “I’ll get everything ready as I need to make a few modifications” Jumba says as he exits the room with reducer in hand.

A few minutes later Jumba came back to the room with reducer in one hand with the other hand clutched holding the shrunk x-buggy. He places the shrunk vehicle in a large space of the room and using the reducer to bring it back to normal size. To pass the time Stitch feels Lilo’s belly to feel movement from his young with her relaxing and enjoying the touch while Jumba worked on the buggy and putting new additions. “Preparations are complete. 626, stand here” Jumba says as he points in front of buggy. Stitch did as he was told and stood at directed spot. Jumba then grabs his alien laptop from table and walks toward Lilo who is sitting on his bed. He places the laptop on her lap and says, “Little girl, press this button”. She did and the laptop lit up and what was shown what looks like to be a camera feed that shows Stitch in front of the camera. “Hey Stitch, I can see you”. Stitch looks around the front of the buggy and finds the camera and decides to make a couple goofy faces making Lilo laugh.

“Enough playing around. Let’s get started. Come on 626” says Jumba annoyed by the silliness. Jumba gets into the buggy and Pleakley asks, “Wait, I’m not joining? Then what am I supposed to do?”. Jumba replies, “You take care of Lilo and keep big sister from finding out until right time. Also, you will inject us into little girl with this”. He then pulls out a small device that they will be placed in when shrunk. “Wait, why is that small and when it involved me you used a giant needle that hurt?”. Jumba then says, “She is little girl” which Pleakley understood until Jumba continues with, “Could have used the same for you but was more fun to see you in pain” which made Pleakley angry but calmed down being the more mature one. “Before I forget...” Jumba says as he got out the buggy and heads toward Lilo to her pull a single strand of hair out her head. “Ow! What was that for?” Lilo asks while rubbing her head. He replies, “Going to need this just in case” then heading back to the buggy boarding it.

“Come on 626. We must hurry before Nani comes home”. Stitch replies with “okie-taka” then looks back at Lilo while giving final rub of her belly. “Bye Boojiboo”. Lilo heard him say that when he was lovestruck with Angel, so she thinks to herself does he feel the same with her no that they have little ones on the way or did have feelings before. Stitch jumps up and lands into the passenger seat in which the glass seals both of them in. Jumba then presses a button inside and activates the reducer blasting them causing them to shrink to microscopic size. Pleakely then uses a vial that sucks the buggy in and fills it with a bit a fluid before setting into small device. He walks toward Lilo and then asks her, “You ready Lilo?”. She nods and Pleakely tells her to turn around and lift her shirt. Based on what Jumba said, to be the closest to the womb the best spot would be to inject into her butt in which he did placing the device on one butt cheek and pulled the trigger causing Lilo to make a little squeal from the sharp poke. Pleakley helps Lilo slowly lay back on Jumba’s bed and gives her the laptop to see what’s happening inside.

Once inside, Jumba turns on the buggy and it propels through Lilo’s bloodstream. Jumba hits another button to put up a display that shows a complete layout of Lilo’s body giving which path to take to reach her womb. They both determine the right path and propel through the many blood vessels while avoiding her body’s defenses. After a while of traveling they found an opening leading to the womb. Once inside the spacious baby maker organ Stitch, Jumba, and Lilo looking through the laptop were surprised to see Lilo pregnant with...
111111131.title: Jumba and Stitch’s Shrunk Journey

choices: How about going to the POV of Lilo and Pleakley
1111111311.content:
The two got closer and they all got to see there were five babies inside resting in the center of the womb. Three of them looked to be like Stitch being little balls of fur except one had dark black fur like it’s mom hair and is female while the other two were blue furred like Stitch with one being male and the other female. The last two were human with one being human that had few strands of blue hair and male while the other looked exactly like her mother when she was a baby. “This is incredible. Both human and alien are growing in little girl. All retaining certain characteristics of their parents”. Stitch puts his paws on face on the glass while saying “Eegalagoo”. Lilo looks through the camera and says, “Wow, they look so cool. Can’t wait to see when they grow up” where Stitch agrees with an “Ih”. “We should check to see if they have the strengths of their father” Jumba says as he brings the buggy closer to the fetuses. He makes a device come out of the buggy that will scan each of the babies. After a while of scanning her get the results that each one of them have more strength then normal and will increase as they grow. Their intelligence will also be high and increase as well when they get older. “Looks like the babies will be incredible like their father. All the result of my genius. Congratulations you two”.
Then they were amazed at what happens next as all the babies began to move a bit each of them kicking. Then Lilo and Pleakley look at all the movement under her shirt where she then pulls up her shirt to get a better glimpse of the movement within her belly.

While the two outside were distracted, Jumba muted communications with the outside to chat with Stitch alone. “Jumba?” Stitch says confused why his creator did that. “626, are you happy with what you see?” Stitch gives a “Ih” as he continues to admire his developing offspring. Jumba then says, “What would you say if I can give you and Lilo more?”. Stitch then turns to Jumba and Jumba continues with, “I happened to create more of the serum that made it possible for little girl to have babies. I also have some of her DNA that I can combine with yours then place the serum inside the buggy and have it release outside and create more offspring. Choice is yours”.

Stitch couldn’t believe he can have more kids with Lilo making his family bigger if he wanted to. He gave it some thought and answers with...
1111111311.title: Five babies (Quintuplets)

choices: Babies are going to grow once again
Lilo moving. Trying to hide her belly from Nani who came home early from work.
Mixture was too strong and babies were multiplying, filling Lilo’s womb
11111113111.content:
“Ih” was Stitch’s answers as he wanted more babies and bigger family with his boojiboo. “Alright. Then need just one more thing” says Jumba as he reaches above Stitch’s head. He plucks out a bit of fur and Stitch lets out a loud “Ow!” which made him think that this was familiar as he remembered that was the same thing that happened that one time with Lilo. Jumba then grabs a containment pod then fills with liquid that Lilo grabbed earlier. He then places lock of Lilo’s hair and Stitch’s fur inside causing the mixture to bubble and change colors. Once the mixture became stable he closes containment pod and places in a large hole placed in the dashboard hearing a securing noise. “Watch this 626” Jumba says as he presses a button.

They watch as the mixture was leaving the containment traveling through the buggy and entering Lilo’s womb. Lilo and Pleakley were watching through the laptop and the mixture flowing out not knowing what it is. “Uh... guys? What are you doing?”. Then they all watch as the mixture split into ten and then started expanding and forming into shapes. Outside, Lilo was beginning to moan as Pleakley is shocked to see her belly grow. Her growing belly was pushing the laptop looking like it was going to fall off her body. With quick enough reflexes, Pleakley manages to catch it before it plummeted to the ground. Lilo continues to moan as her belly continues to grow looking like it was never going stop even making her belly button an outie.

Back inside, Jumba and Stitch watch as the mixture continue to form into physical bodies with some looking like Stitch and some looking human. They continued to grow until they reached the same size and development stage as the previous five already inside then her belly stopped growing. Finally, some umbilical cords formed and attached to the new babies making them linked with their mother “Ohana” Stitch only manages to say while still marveling at his new children. “Family indeed. Big one in fact. Hope you ready to be a dad in future. I feel accomplished to be a grandpa of course. I can have new army to cause evil everywhere” Jumba says before giving out an evil laugh. Stitch turns around and gives him angry look along with a small snarl. “Calm down 626. Is was only a joke (Mostly)”. Stitch was about to say something until he heard a voice through the speakers. “Stitch? What is going on in there?” Lilo asks with the laptop beside as her belly was too big to put over her and likely fall. Jumba clears his throat and explains, “626 wanted more offspring between you two and so I granted his request”. “Is that true?” asks Lilo in which Stitch immediately replied with “Ih”. “Why don’t you see for yourself little girl”. Lilo didn’t notice that only the audio was working and the camera feed must have turned off when the laptop was closed after being caught by Pleakley. She pushes a button and turns on camera and what Lilo and Pleakley saw next astonished them. They saw a total of fifteen babies inside her womb with a mix of humans and Stitch’s kind with moving some of their bodies while the other slept comfortably. “Oh my gosh, they look amazing. Thank you Jumba”. “Not a problem Lilo”. Lilo decided to rest a bit while rubbing her enormous belly while Jumba and Stitch monitors the babies a bit more.

Time passes and that’s when Jumba decided they should leave. “Come on 626. Time to go you can see them when they are born. Stitch yells “Naga!” while trying to keep Jumba away from the controls. “626! Enough fooling around”. This went on for a while until everywhere around them the womb around them was being to rumble and shake. What caused the womb to shake is...
11111113111.title: Stitch Wants More

choices: 10-20 babies.  Lilo shock & Stitch fainted again
30-40 babies.  Lilo fainted & stitch fainted again.  Pleakley join in also.
111111132.content:
I have a sound operational thermal virtual counsel mobile device to see the offsprings and make sure that you are heathy little girl." After Lilo hearing only the last word thing one word come out. "Ultrasound?"

DeeDee looks at him in silence and blinks. "English, nerd."

"Hmmm, you know, while this is does feel wonderful, I can't help but feel like I could go bigger," she said while staring down at her belly. A smile began to spread across her face as she began flipping pages in the book until she found the right spell.

She cleared her throat and began to recite the spell, then leaned back in her chair once she had finished, grinning in excitement for what was about to come. At first she saw a faint pinkish glow begin to emanate from her belly that slowly intensified. She watched her belly in awe, before rolling her head back and moaning in pure pleasure as her began to expand outwards, inch by inch.

Almost immediately her outfit began to tear at her belly button before quickly spreading out from there. Her growing belly continued to surge from her frame, passing her knees and even pushing the table away with its sheer girth. Her mind was in a haze during the whole process, she couldn't form a single thought as her body was wracked with intense pleasure.

At last the growing seemed to abate, and she was finally able to calm down enough to witness the end result: she looked down but nearly fainted from excitement. Her belly was huge, but not even huge was the best word to describe how big it was, it was massive. It now stuck out a full four feet from her body. Her legs were spread as wide as she could possibly stretch them, and even then the sides of her belly were still laying on top of them.

She looked down, and gasped in shock at what she could (or couldn't) see; all she could looking down was the expanse of her belly, she might as well not even have legs since she couldn't see them even while turning to her side. Her Lucky Girl outfit was trashed, her belly was now completely exposed.

Gwen tried to heave herself up but couldn't, she tried as hard as she could lift her heft frame up but it was simply too heavy for her to bear. Luckily though her spell book was still within reach, and after casting another spell her belly now felt light enough to her that she now heft herself out of her seat, though it was still heavy enough her her to arch her back.

She was struggling to find words, she was so excited that she barely even breath, her heart was pounding like a drum, "I-I.....I..I'm........sooooo.....BIIIIIG!" she yelled, in total bliss. "Forget about being a princess, I am the QUEEN of pregnancy!"

151321312131421221322122.content:
Once she was out of the Jedi Order Ahsoka slowly realized that since she was no longer a Jedi she no longer had to behave like a Jedi, and she especially didn't have to follow their various rules and codes of conduct. Now that she was on her own, she was discovering just what kind of person she was, what kind of woman she was, and deep down, she wanted to be a woman....a very, very pregnant woman.

She had always been fascinated by pregnancy, from her earliest years as a Youngling learning as much as she could to her time as a Padawan, when chastity and celibacy were strictly enforced, dashing any hopes of experiencing it, though the taboo nature of it did reinforce the idea in her head, and it quickly became her secret fetish.

For the time being she was living in a small dwelling on a remote planet, miles away from the nearest city. It took some doing to be able to establish herself without revealing who she was, let alone trying to acquire credits, but now that she was safe and secure she finally felt comfortable with what she was about to try.

She pulled out a small wrapped object and from behind a shelf and opened it up, revealing a small data file, hastily taken from the Jedi Archives before she fled to her new home. In it contained several Jedi techniques and meditations that were forbidden for Padawans and even more Jedi, but the second she saw what they were she knew she had to try them.

After thoroughly reading the technique enough times she sat back on the ground and began to meditate, concentrating her focus entirely on her belly, slowly breathing in and out. As time went on she gradually intensified her focus and now pressed both hands against her belly, directing her Force energy into her abdomen.

A faint glow began to emanate from her belly, and she soon felt a strange tightness inside her as her skin began to stretch and expand....

When the process was finished,

The only sounds (apart from Gwen's various coos and moans) were the faint groans as her belly stretched outwards and the ever ripping seam of her outfit, already exposing over half of her belly.

After nearly a minute and a half the spell finally began to subside as it completed its intended task. Gwen stared down at her now much larger belly with pride, admiring her smooth tight skin and the seemingly endless curve as it projects out from her frame. Her Lucky Girl outfit was now trashed, her belly was fully exposed with huge heaps of the costume now flailing on her sides, effectively turning it into a belly shirt and some yoga pants.

Gwen glanced over at Ben; his belly was now completely flat with no indication that he was ever pregnant at all besides his shirt being a little bunched up from where it once was. She oomphed as she felt the kicks of Ben's former babies now struggle for space inside her already compact belly, "Oooooo, don't worry babies, Mommy can handle all of you herself."

"Hmmm...." Natalie hummed absently, as she sat on the couch flicking though channels on the TV, dejected. Over in the kitchen her daughter Gwen was busy gorging herself with a feast of snacks, satisfying her "cravings". Natalie blushed slightly whenever she heard her daughter's faint coos and yelps as her babies kicked and shifted.

Natalie always knew her daughter had an interest in all things pregnancy related, ever since she was little she'd stuff pillows and blankets into her tops and waddle around, a habit that continued all the way to the present day, becoming more elaborate and realistic along the way as well. She had no problem with it whatsoever, it was a fantasy that all girls had so there was nothing that bad about it, plus it helped keep Gwen's nose in her books since she was always weighed down, so that was a nice plus.

However, that changed once Gwen came back from spending the one summer with her grandfather and her cousin Ben, she could use magic! After explaining herself to the both of them Natalie and her husband agreed that she could keep using magic around the house, but only in the house, and is she ever broke anything or caused any real problem they'd take the spell book off her.

At first everyone worked out fine with no major issues, but then one day something happened that shook Natalie to the core. She was at the dinner table, yelling out for Gwen to come out of her room and get it while it was hot, She's probably just fussing with getting a pillow under her shirt, she thought, and sure enough she waddled her way in moments later, her "belly" pressed against the table.

As they ate however, Gwen reached for seconds, then thirds, and quaduples, Natalie had no idea where she was putting it all, but then as she finished her plate seemingly for good she lifted up her shirt, revealing a huge ball that was strangely flesh toned. It took her a good few seconds to realize what she was seeing, and her face went completely red the second that happened: her belly was real!

Almost immediately Natalie slammed her hands against the table and demanded an explanation. Gwen detailed how she stumbled upon a pregnancy spell that allowed her to be as pregnant as she wanted for as long as she wanted. Despite her blush Natalie acted enraged, arguing how she couldn't leave the house now, to which Gwen explained that she put a spell canceler enchantment on the front door: the second she walks out that door her belly goes away, and the second she walks back in it's back again. With a frustrated sigh Natalie admitted that she was fine with this, since she still wasn't technically breaking any rules (except for the one where little kids can't get pregnant).

Natalie grumbled as she watched Gwen scarf down more food, glaring down at her belly as it shifted and moved. She struggled to hide it, but it was getting more difficult by the day: she was jealous of her daughter. Unbeknownst to Gwen Natalie was just as into pregnancy as she was, and seeing her little girl living out both of their deepest fantasies and flaunting it no less only made her grit her teeth.

With a grunt, she quickly stood up, determined. "Now it's my turn," she said to herself, storming over to her daughter. "Gwen, I need to talk you," she said, yanking the girl away from her bowl of ice cream and plopping her down on the couch.

"You see....you take after me in so many ways, but there's one that you haven't realized just yet." Gwen stared at her in confusion, "What's that?" she asked, before yelping in surprise as her mother lifted her shirt up. "You see.....I'm into pregnancy too," she moaned, spreading her hands across her daughter's belly.

"M-Mom!?" Gwen stammered, completely taken aback by that revelation. "Shhh.....it's alright dear. Now, the reason I'm telling you this is because....welllll......I want to be pregnant too...."

154121113221123.content:
Jazz was having a little internal crisis. She had finally achieved her dream of knowing just what it was like to be filled with life (even though it was technically not alive) and now it was about to be taken away. By her own brother no less!

She couldn't let that happen. She had to keep the belly. She had to protect it. But then she remembered that she had the means to do so.

She smirked at Danny, "Actually, I've got a much better idea."

Danny didn't like the emphasis she put on the word, "Jazz...? What're you-" he saw her reaching for the belt, and started backing away uneasily. "No. Jazz no! Don't you dare-!"

He couldn't finish talking as the light from the belt enveloped him, and stared sucking him in towards the opening.

"Jazz when this blows over we are gonna have a serious taaaaalllkkk..." were his last words before he was fully imprisoned.

The process had left Jazz with a belly resembling that of one holding twins at full term. Her shirt couldn't contain the full sphere and rode up, completely exposing it in all its glory. Her belly button even popped out into a rubbery little nub.

Jazz had to sit down. The extra weight was too much at the moment, but she couldn't keep her hands off herself, she was constantly patting and rubbing the giant orb.

"Sorry Danny... but nobody is taking this away from me..." She moaned, completely overwhelmed by the pleasure.

Suddenly, a certain glow had enveloped her entire body, one she had seen dozens of times before.

In a flash, it was gone. But her appearance had changed completely. She was no longer in her black sweater and jeans, she was wearing a jumpsuit with the same black and white designs as Danny's Phantom form, but her belly was totally exposed. To top it off, her hair was white, and her eyes were green.

She came to a realization, "Am I..." to test her theory, she raised an arm and pointed her hand towards the sky, and a green blast of energy came out.

"YES! I can't believe it! I've actually got ghost powers now!"

Despite only now getting them, she raised herself off the ground, taking flight and zipping through the air despite her large size. She had all the powers Danny had, and it all felt amazing. Her only theory as to why, was due to introducing Danny's hybrid DNA into her body, it allowed her access to his abilities.

She now new exactly what her brother felt when he went ghostly. And it was all thanks to having him in her precious, beautiful belly...

...Another thought occurred to her... why stop at two? In fact why stop at just herself? It would be selfish to hog this heavenly sensation all to herself. Surely she could convince other females of that. Or better yet... why make their compliance a factor in the first place?

Jazz felt her two occupants squirm and toss around within her. She "knew" they agreed. She would do the world a favor, she would unite the world's of human and ghost through her actions.

And she set off to do just that.

(What's next?)

1543211.content:
Sitting at their trailer park the three Kanker sisters sat on the couch, with Lee lazily flicking the channels, Marie reading a magazine and May was nowhere in sight.

"Hey, any idea where May has gone?" Lee asked, not even bothering to look at her sister. "She's usually the first one up during breakfast."

"Beats the hell out of me," Marie muttered, flipping to another page "Maybe we got lucky and she finally left or something."

Then right on cue, the trailer door was flung open as they saw May standing there, holding a box with something inside and having a widest grin on her face. The two other sisters looked with confusion at each other, than back at May.

"What are YOU smiling about?" Lee asked, muting the TV "Seriously, last time you smiled like that was when Lumpy nearly kissed you."

"Because I found something really cool in the junk yard!" May exclaimed, dropping the box on the kitchen table.

Now being rather curious, they approached May as she pulled a strange looking device from the box. The device looked like it had pump with small drill in the center, while said device was attached to a strange resemblance of a air compressor or least what should be an air compressor. Blinking, Lee and Marie watched as May attached the device to her bellybutton and plugged it in, first they heard a strange whirring sound. May meeped, feeling the drill burrow into her belly button, after which a soft hissing sound escaped from the device. Both sisters looked wide eyed as they saw May's stomach was starting to balloon and rise before their very own eyes. Giggling, May rubbed her belly as it grew bigger and bigger, until it looked like the blond was heavily preggers. Shutting off the device, she pulled it out and smirked patting her belly, while posing for her sisters.

"Well, wacha think?" She asked, giggling sweetly at them "I look like mom when she had us, even bigger I'd say!"

"I wish to have you, Timmy, As my son." The Principal says smiling, Timmy's eyes widen but given how much affection she has for him, He decided to humor her in a more intimate way, instead of turning into being her Son by her having her features, he decided that she needs to carry and birth him as a true mother would do.

He made a mental wish which made his wand react by glowing and-

*POOF*

Principal Waxerplax caught from the pink smoke until it dissipates only to notice that Timmy was gone.

".. Timmy? Where are you?" She says, beginning to get concerned and a bit angry "This isn't funny- Ahh!" She gasped sharply on the sensation of a tiny kick.

Said kick came from inside her body, her belly to be exact.

She looked down and gasped "Oh my gosh!" She looked bloated, gravid but firm gut it lies extended enough that the lower parts of her uniform lies unbuttoned, letting her belly bare and in the air. Her hands touched the bare, round extended surface, she felt another kick from the inside, it was like...

"...Being pregnant.." She finally realized.

"T-Timmy?"

She received another kick Yes

"Oh my gosh... it worked." The Principal saw the implications, she was pregnant with Timmy, Timmy was her son now, her hands move around the firm globe of fat and flesh that contained one of her students as she continues to process what just happened.

+++

Timmy Turner... or Geraldine now, rubbed the inner walls of the Principal's pulsing and warm nurturing womb. When he appeared, he was regressed to toddlerhood, naked, the lack of oxygen was soon fixed when the umbilical cord grew out of the walls and attached to his belly button and the womb started to get filled up by Amniotic Fluid.

He could hear her voice echoing through his fleshy chamber, the tone of surprise and awe didn't escape behind the loud sounds of her heart and other bodily function that surrounds him.

154332211.title: Lapis

1543322112.content:
Lapis.is the most beautiful and elegant gem on in SU but the poor gem has suffered a lot in her life from being trapped in a mirror for decades. Being abused by Jasper. having to put up with Peridot.
This skinny beautiful gem deserves something to make her happy. maybe a sad gem just needs a belly full of gem babies. and a lot of them.
But how?


1. Lapis is taken by Homeworld and used for experiments.
Most of which involve seeing if she can become pregnant with many gem babies without dying.
This would change Homeworld forever making it that the gems would never have to harvest planets again.
But just how will these experiments go?

2. Jasper had abused Lapis for a long time and when she fused with Jasper to create malachite she was with her for so long.
But a strange affect happened after, it seemned Lapis was now pregnant with Jaspers Quartz babies and a lot of them.
How would Lapis deal with being pregnant with the many children of her abuser?

Or more.
1543322112.title: More ideas.

choices: The homeworld sends a special drone
15433221121.content:
The homeworld knew that their kind couldn't really bare children without losing their lives in the process. But, they needed to change that aspect somehow and for that they needed a suitable test subject. One such subject ended up being Lapis Lazuli, who fit as a very suitable candidate for this task, the problem was that she was against the Homeworld and thus classified as a rebel of their empire.

So, a task was issued to create a perfect way to make her pregnant, and making sure they don't feel the wrath of the psychologically unhinged blue gem, but also her companions as well. Sitting in her throne, Yellow Diamond was busy pondering up her plan, since last thing she wanted was an out all war with these, plus if Lapis does indeed be able to bear gem children and not perish, she'll need to be retreated and studied, so they could replicate these procedures for other future gems. Rubbing her things together, she began to go over every possible detail and plan, as an idea began to formulate in her head about this.
15433221121.title: Homeworld experiments.

choices: Any gem that touches her tummy will impregnate her!
She will slowly get bigger and bigger through her Pregnacy till she is massive!
154332211211.content:
Yellow Diamond had spent a while planning this genius plan.

If she could pull this off her species would thrive and she would be hailed a hero for helping gem kind find a way to stop harvesting planets in order to reproduce.
Lapis may be a traitor to her own kind but she could still be useful as a breeder for gem kind.

Yellow put her plan into motion when she sent out a special drone that was like a round yellow orb about the the size of a football.
It went out into space and warped out over to Earth.

The drone went down onto the planet and searched out for Lapis Lazuli.
It soon came to the barn and silently flew down and into the barn.
It was the dead of night and all that could be heard was the cicadas singing
And...snoring?

To the drones surprise it found both Lapis and Peridot sleeping in the barn.
Both sleeping in hammocks.
It was even more surprised to find Lapis was the source of the snoring? it was strange to see such a beautiful gem snore so loudly.

Gems never really needed to sleep so this just made it easy for the drone to do it's mission.
It quietly went over to Lapis who was snoring with her arms behind her head as she slept.

The drone went down to her exposed tummy and out of the drone came a needle.
It slowly inserted into her belly button making Lapis grunt and wince a bit in her sleep.

The drone then injected a special kind of serum down into her belly.
That would affect her whole body and gem.

Gems are shapeshifters so the serum did two things.
It made sure that Lapis Lazuli couldn't shapeshifted in anyway that would hard her babies.
And it would also create a permanent fully formed womb in her belly without her knowing.

Then came the last step it was specific for this whole thing to work.
It began to inject a steady steam of liquid gem shards.
The shards were new and would form inside of Lapis Lazulis tummy.

Yellow Diamond wanted Lapis Lazuli to give many babies so it filled her up with a lot of the liquid.

Lapis Lazuli moaned and cooed in her sleep as her belly inflated into a nice round size like a slowly inflating water balloon
Her tummy grew bigger and rounder looking like she was full term with a baby but it kept going as it filled her with more liquid,
By the time it was done Lapis looked pregnant with full term triplets.

The drone the took out the needle having completed it's mission of impregnating Lapis Lazuli
Lapis Lazuli moaned in her sleep as she brought her right hand to her massive orb of a tummy and rubbed it feeling her smooth blue tummy.

The drone had a camera feed that let Yellow Diamond and her Pearl watch as Lapis Lazuli was impregnated.
Yellow smiled evilly and said "My plan is going smoothly, just as planned!

Her Pearl said "My Diamond, I thought you said you wanted her to be big, I mean don't get me wrong, even by human standards she is very large, but knowing you I thought your ambitions would be to say...larger?

Yellow snickered and said "Oh my Pearl...this is only the beginning, that big bellied gem is going to get a whole lot bigger. For you see......"
154332211211.title: The homeworld sends a special drone

1543322112111.content:
"Any gem who comes in contact with her stomach, will make her swell larger!" Yellow Diamond said, flashing her evil smile "So, let's see how this will play out~"

Her Pearl blinked, but nodded her head as she turned back towards the monitor. She had to admit, this was a rather interesting plan her leader had and it would be interesting how would it go. The next day, Lapis was the first to awaken early, since she knew Peridot was a very tight sleeper, so it was best not to awaken her. Getting out of her hammock, Lapis ruffled up her hair as she made her way to clean herself up, at first not paying much attention to a strange heavy weight she was experiencing.

As she stepped in to clean herself, she looked down and suddenly let out a loud scream which made Peridot fall out her hammock and quickly jump up, as she brought up several metal spikes due to her magnet powers.

"Lapis?! What's wrong!?" She yelled, looking around frantically "Are we under attack?! Should I get the Gems?!"

Turning her head, she then saw Lapis waddle out her back arched as her swollen belly was fully presented before them. Blinking several times, Peridot lowered her weapons she approached Lapis and stared at her swollen orb.

"Lapis, have you swallowed too much water?" She asked sounding rather bluntly "Or did you over indulge on those humans snacks?"

"I..I..I..Don't know!" Lapis exclaimed, as she huffed "I...I just woke up like this!"

Tilting her head, Peridot approached closer as she then carefully poked Lapis's belly. When that happened, they both meeped as they saw the blue gems belly balloon out bigger, which made her eyes shrink with a strange twitch appearing in her left eye. Not to mention, she swore she felt some movement insider her belly.

Her Pearl smiled "You truly are a genius my Diamond!

Back with Lapis and Peridot, Peridot had managed to calm Lapis down a bit with some deep breathing exercises.

Peridot thought about it for a bit and then said....

"Well, we have that old X-Ray machine I build. We can use that to see what happened to you."

Lapis nodded in agreement, as she watched Peridot scamper away to fetch the device. While Peri was gone, Lapis looked at herself in the mirror, as she felt rather silly looking the way she did and yet..also...happy? Nah, maybe it was just her imagination, she couldn't really be happy while looking so huge and swollen. Then, she stood in profile arching her back as her hands glided across her exposed tummy, making her cheeks go a tad dark blue from this. "Alright Lapis, all ready!" She said, then looked at her friend "Umm..What are you doing?"

"EEP! N-Nothing!" Lapis exclaimed, as she turned around and whistled "J-Just..N-Nothing! A-Anyway!"

Waddling over, she then stood where the screen was as Peridot turned it on, after some adjusting they looked at the screen with Peridots eyes going wide and colors draining away. Wondering what had her friend so freaked out, Lapis looked down and gasped seeing that the screen showed her actually having babies inside her belly! Some of which actually resembled Peridot, which made the green gems colors drain even faster.

"P-Please don't kill me..." Peridot whispered, as she looked nervously at Lapis.

"Ummm..I..I won't.." Lapis responded, still shocked herself "Peri...am I?"

Peridot gulped, not knowing what to say on this occassion.

once Steven saw Lapis his jaw drooped and his eyes grew into saucers.

Approaching Laps closer, Steven then carefully touched her belly. Both Lapis and Peridot gasped, not having time to warn him, as the blue gems belly began to swell bigger and bigger. Blinking, Steven jumped back as Peridot pushed the X-Ray machine between them, and to their surprise they saw that now Lapis had human children in her womb.

"I'll try to find the book or Connie." She said, then whispered to Steven "You meanwhile keep an eye on Lapis, last thing we need is her going crazy with panic and flooding the barn."

Once everyone arrived they all huddled together in a private room in the palace meant for meditation. Aang was in the middle of the room meditating.

"Okay everyone, I'm going to get started. I'm not sure exactly how this technique works, but the details in the scroll suggest that it's sole purpose is for the rejuvenation of the Air Nation in times of crisis. Now I want all of you to surround me while I begin, and brace yourselves for whatever happens."

He closed his eyes and began to mutter incantations while making various hand gestures. As he went on the group began to feel a pulse emanate from him, and the air in the room started to feel a bit thin. For nearly twenty minutes this went on, by the end the pulsing felt to them like being surrounded by heavy drumming.

They watched Aang intently, but then out of nowhere his tattoos lit up as he entered the avatar state. They were concerned as he stopped talking and moving, his arms limp at his sides, then he suddenly began rising up from the ground, hovering ten feet in the air.

"Aang! What's happening?" Katara called out, but he didn't seem to hear her. They were now fearful, thinking something had gone wrong. Aang slowly started to lift up his hands and closed his eyes, in moments large orbs of energy appeared in each palm. Without warning he opened his eyes and yelled out, flinging his hands out like an attack, and the room went completely white......

Several hours later the group groggily began to come to, they were found Aang passed out as well, practically drained. They had no idea what happened, and they asked Aang about it he said he couldn't remember anything passed the first ten minutes of the ceremony. While they were nervous about what had happened, they were overcome by exhaustion and decided to look further into it the next day. They each went to their own rooms to rest.

They wake up the next day.....

Searching the ruins, Katara suddenly came across a room with various scrolls where among those which have long withered or were burned to a crisp, she found one that still remained intact. 15433222232222221222.content:
Laying the scroll down on the ground before her, Katara slowly practiced the various steps of the technique, doing her best to master the proper stances and moves required to perform it correctly.

The scroll detailed that the technique was meant to imbue someone with "essence of life" but didn't go into exact details regarding what that actually meant. Regardless, she wasn't going to refrain from learning more about water bending simply because she was unsure of something.

She made her way out of the ruins and over to a nearby river, and after a few dry run-throughs, Katara felt confident that she could perform the technique. She undid the sash tied around her waist, then began to clear her thoughts. "Ok.....here goes nothing," she muttered, as she began to perform the technique.

Slowly, a very thin but very dense stream of water began to rise out of the river, it moved toward her, slowly encircling her body from the ground up. As it circled her body it began to glow, only intensifying as it rose higher off the ground. As it approached her head, she guided the stream upwards, then raised her head to stare at it head on.

Carefully, Katara began directing the stream towards her mouth, keeping it open as wide as she possibly could, she was a little nervous, but she was sure everything would be fine. The stream met her lips as it began to force its way down her throat; Katara gagged a bit at first but her throat relaxed as the steady stream continued to flow into her body.

She kept pulling the water into herself as she began to feel her belly expand, but yet despite seemingly drinking several gallons of water she never felt even remotely as full as she should have, it must be something to do with the concentrated energy in the water, she thought, feeling her belly grow even bigger.

After several minutes she finally stopped the stream, letting the water around her fall into the ground around her; the scroll didn't detail how long to perform the technique should last so she imagined that it was up to the user's discretion. She looked down at herself and gasped, "Oh my.....," she muttered, transfixed on her engorged belly. It completely stuck out of her robes, looking comparable to a woman's who was nine months pregnant, and yet surprisingly she didn't have any stretch marks from all the pressure, every inch of it was silky smooth. She ran her hands across its surface, "This is...weird......ohhh!," she moaned, her belly feeling very, very sensitive to the touch. "W-Why...ohhhhh.......what was...ahhh....the point of this....ohh...technique?" she thought, still compulsively rubbing her belly the whole time.

It was very alien and yet oddly soothing at the same time, making her cooe and giggle softly. Due to the fact that they split up, Katara had to do double the work in hopes of finding her companions and the waddling made the process very slow, but the sloshing and occasional belly rub made the movement more tolerable . Before she could formulate a plan Aang sprang his head from over the corner, "Katara?" She yelped and jumped back, her belly loudly sloshing from the quick movement. Aang stood there for a moment in silence, his wide eyes gawking at her exposed belly, his face turning redder by the second.

"H-Hey.....Aang.......uhhhh......ahhh....," Katara blurted, not able to think of anything clever. "Ahh....umm...what...ahhhhhh...soooo....," Aang stammered, "Ummmmm..........Katara?...........what-what.......uuhhhhh," he gestured to her belly. Katara blushed, her hand resting on top of her belly. "It's.....kind of a long story......"

After Katara described the scroll and the strange waterbending technique, "Soooooooo........do you know what's.......going to happen?" Aang asked. "What do you mean?" "Well....I mean now you have all that water....inside you........uuhhhh....(he turns redder)....is that...it?" he replied. 154332222322222212221212.content:
Aang's gaze never left the stream of water as it slowly began to go into Katara's mouth, as she leaned her head back slightly and accepted the water as it pushed its way down her throat.Since he didn't look away he didn't seem to notice how the stream began to fork near the ground and a separate stream began making its way towards him, Katata herself didn't see it either since she had her eyes closed, doing her best to enjoy the experience now that she knew what to expect.

The stream was nearly up to Aang's waist before he noticed the faint glow of the water, drawing his attention away from Katara's slowly expanding belly. "W-What!?" he gasped, trying to jump away, but a presence was forcing him to stay where he was, he couldn't move his legs even a step. It must be the spirit energy, he thought, once it begins it must not be able to stop.

His eyes darted left and right as he watched the stream make its way up to his face. Withing moments he was face to face with the stream, which stood motionless for a second, waiting for him to concede to the inevitable. Aang quietly closed his eyes and opened his mouth, his face turning red as he began to imagine comparing his belly with Katara's. The stream slowly continued and met his lips, then pushed through into his mouth, before moving down his throat, he gasped the moment he felt the cold (yet oddly soothing) feeling of the water drop into his stomach.

The two of them stood there as the technique took hold, the room was silent beyond the sound of moving water and their occasional muffled moans. Katara's belly continued to balloon outwards, and without even a hint of a stretch mark, and Aang's began to push his robes up and reveal itself to the world.

After several long minutes the water suddenly stopped on its own, loudly splashing around them as the last few drops went down their throats. Katara's mouth hung open for an extra couple of seconds, as if she wanted more, before quietly closing sadly. She opened her eyes and stared down at her belly and gasped in delight, "Ohhhh! Ohhh....wow!.......ohhh....wow!" she muttered, beaming at her engorged belly, which now made her look overdue with quintuplets. It was now completely exposed to the world, jutting out like a brown caramel candy ball and just as smooth and shiny.

"Ohhh....and....there you have it.........A-Aang!?" she sputtered, her eyes going wide at the sight of Aang with his own engorged belly, looking nearly overdue with twins, contently rubbing it as if he was oblivious to her. "W-What...what....what....what happened," she managed to say, her mind a flutter with shock, astonishment, confusion.....and a growing sense of arousal.

Her panic snapped him back to reality as he looked over at her, his face immediately going red once he caught a glimpse of her now much, much bigger belly. Doing his best to explain the situation (as he was very distracted) the two of them slowly waddled over to where Aang had set up camp for the night; Katara needed his help lowering herself down onto the ground, both of them blushed at the intense sloshing sound her belly made as she got down to the ground.

"We'll....ahh...we'll figure this out....but I don't know about you but I feel like I could sleep for three days, so how about we (yawns) figure it out tomorrow?" Aang asked her. Katara didn't like not knowing what else could happen from that technique, but she couldn't argue that she was about to fall over herself, so the two of them laid back and snuggled together (since Aang only had his supplies) and the two of them quickly asleep for the night, Aang absently resting his head against her belly as he drifted off.

1543322223222222122212121.content:
Late into the morning the next day, the two of finally began to groggily wake up. Aang was the first to wake up, he yawned and starting rubbing his eyes. He absently looked over and beamed at Katara, who was still asleep but still tightly clung to his left hand, smiling contently.

He didn't want to disturb her yet so for the moment he just laid there, basking in her warmth, but their blankets started to weigh him down to the point of being uncomfortable to he leaned up and tried to pull them off him, but to his shock he couldn't lean up, he was pinned down by something heavy. He quickly airbended the blankets off the them and gasped: it wasn't the blanket weighing him down, it was his belly. He stared at silently, his eyes getting wider and wider as his mouth hung open more and more; somehow, it had grown much, much bigger since the night before, now he was looking pregnant with sextuplets, and he felt like it too. He reached out his hand and touched the upper curve of his belly where it curved out from his chest, and while before it was squishy and sloshy, now there was no yield to his touch, it was firm.

"Katara, Katara wake up!" he yelled in her ear, though she just grunted a little in her sleep and drifted back. He flung a gust of air at her, flinging her hair back completely off her face and flinging the rest of the blanket off of them both. He gasped once he caught sight of her belly. Now she groaned and began waking up, "(Yawns)...A-Aang? What's...what's going...(yawns)...on?"

He shook her with his still pinned left arm and jerked her more awake, "Something's wrong with that technique, I don't know what really, but we're...bigger than we were last night." Katara glanced at him in slight confusion, "What do you mean, I don't feel that....much..diff.....(she stops, her mouth hangs agape while she stares at her belly, finally turning away from Aang to actually see it for herself.

If Aang's was big, her's was massive: she practically looked pregnant with Aang himself, yet it was still a perfect dome, without a single blemish or unsightly mark to take away from it's glow. It stuck out nearly three feet from her frame, resting on top of her like a boulder, so much so that it actually was blocking out the sun from her view (and probably why she slept so much more soundly than Aang)

Panic began to settle into both of them, they looked at each other as if hoping the other would know what to do. Katara tried to heave herself up but couldn't, she felt pinned down and no matter how she wiggled the best she was able to was prop herself up into a sitting position (after much huffing and groaning). Aang tried to heft himself up too, though he struggled just as much as she did before earthbending himself up with a stone pillar, which he needed to leave against in order to keep standing.

"Aang...get me that scroll," she asked him, angrily. He airbent it over from the ground and tossed it to her. She laid if out in front of her (using her belly as a table). She frantically ran her fingers down each and every line, going over it again and again, making sure that she didn't miss a thing.

Eventually, she gasped again, only this time her face was red. She looked over at Aang, biting her nail, "Aaaaaang? You're...not gonna believe this......" Aang looked at desperately, "What? What is it, what's going on?" She took a deep breath and sighed. "Well......it looks like......we're.......uhh...we're.........pregnant."

Appa whooshed through the air above the mountains as Katara studied several different maps. During the gang's travels she had heard rumors of a hot spring supposedly somewhere in the heart of the Earth Kingdom that's said to possess unparalleled amounts of spirit energy.

In her search she'd heard tell of where it might be located, coming across a rather densely populated village at the foot of the mountains. She asked around before being directed to one of the village elders, who told her the story passed down for generations of a caravan that stumbled upon the spring. The travelers drank its water, and according to their tale they all suddenly became with child, settling down into the village as it now stood.

Katara blushed as she remembered the story, but still, the idea of finding a secret spring intrigued her, such water might be very useful for healing, much like the spring water at the North Water Tribe.

As Appa circled around she kept going over the maps, occasionally glancing down to see if she could spot it, but to no avail. As she scanned the horizon something suddenly clicked in her head: that one outcropping alongside that ridge. She spread open the one map, and sure enough it matched one of the descriptions. As she had Appa fly lower she noticed a small crack in the mountain's side which looked just wide enough to walk through.

She dismounted the sky bison and made her way inside, the sun shining above lighting the way. After only a few minutes she found exactly what she was looking for: a large natural body of spring water, quietly pouring down through a crack in the mountain above.

She slowly walked forward and bent down, bending a small amount of it into a vial.

"Hmm, I wonder if this really is special," she asked herself.

Infusing unborn dragons with dark concoctions should lear them towards evil. With these powerful allies by my side they shall make me their lord and I'll finally be able to wipe out the humans!” The flame cackled as if triumphant all ready.


Jake awoke after having slept for hours. As his eyes fluttered open his tired mind made him forget where he was.

“Man, I had such a weird dream.” He said to himself rubbing the sleep from his eyes. “I dreamt I was...”

His claws left his face and went to rest on his stomach, with feeling how large and bloated it was he stirred and glazed upon it. Now that his vision was filled by his yellow belly scales his memory now jogged as to what has happened.

“...Oh yeah, I guess that did happ-Ah!”

A sudden jolt of pain that died down as soon as it came caught the young dragon off guard. As he started to rub a claw over his vast egg filled stomach to soothe the area Drako entered into his sight, false concern on his face.

“Are you ok, my queen? You seemed to have felt some discomfort.”

“It's...it's fine, it's passed now it was just-Ahhh!” Another sharp surge hit him, this time the pain stayed. Drako's face lit up with a excitement.

“Oh it's time, my queen! I did not think this clutch would develop so fast but I guess since this is your first the statue wishes for them to come now!” He said playing his role well, he waddled his own large form near to Jake and helped lifted him to his feet.

“Wait what?! Let's talk about this...can this wait for now using magic? I didn't expect it to be so fast!” Jake said as his bulk was being lifted from the bed. A slight sense of fear and regret had entered his mind, he knew he had made the deal to become a breeding dragon queen but maybe he accepted it too soon, birthing had not crossed his mind at the time.

“I'm afraid not my queen, once they've started there's no stopping those wonderful eggs. I shall take you to the birthing pool, you would have passed it on your way here yesterday.”

Both bloated dragons made their way to the pool Drako hefting Jake along. Once they got to the waters Drako helped Jake take off his queenly robe and lay him down in the waters onto his side, Drako kneeled in the waters besides him and started cupping some of the tranquil waters and pouring it upon Jake's belly. As it flowed around his scaled curve the pain began to fade as did some distress from Jake's face.

“That feels so much better, but I'm still not so sure about this. I'm a dude! This isn't suppose to be possi...”

“Shhh it is fine, everything will be ok. Of course this is possible, magic makes anything come true. You wanted this remember? You wished to be a grand breeding queen.”

As the last word left Drako's mouth he stroked his claw along the crown Jake was wearing as it now glowed a tinge of purple. As if a fog went over him Jake's vision and mind become clouded, all he could see was his reflected face from Drako as he was eased and cooed into the situation. His thoughts filled with a wanting, a yearning to be a great mother of so many dragons. As his mind relaxed so his body went to work on pushing his eggs out, his large belly shifted and wobbled and Jake jolted with pleasure as the first of many eggs passed out of his rear.


An hour had passed, the last egg now in Drako's arms as he took it away like the rest. Jake rested and lay in the waters as the sands underneath him cushioned his still well padded rump. His stomach on the other hand was no longer large and bloated though it still held a chubby shape that he had gained from his meal the day before, the jewellery around his neck that had once adored his inflated stomach now hung loosely on his body. He rubbed at the his pudgy yellow scaled belly missing the feeling of just how large it used to stretch out in front of him. Drako re entered, though he was a mirrored form of Jake his own belly was still as large as it ever been. He lay down next to the still resting mother and spoke.

One night Tommy was put to bed in his crib by his mom Didi before she puts his brother Dil to bed. When he was alone Tommy started thinking about this one place he had on his mind for a while. He remember that this place was warm, calm, surrounded what he thought to be was water, and also remembering this one noise that made him feel good when he heard it. He wonders to himself if he can ever go back to that one place since he believes it was better than being inside his crib. He then looks out the window and that’s where he saw a flash of light going through the sky. “That must be a shooting star. I can make a wish”. He closes his eyes and in his mind he wishes if he could make it back to that warm and comfortable place he thought of. At the same time all he can think about is how Angelica can be so mean to him and his friends all the time. He wonders if anything can be done about her to make her at least a little bit nicer. He opens his eyes and hopes his wish comes true not realizing he accidentally joined two wishes together. He then lets out a yawn starting to get really sleepy as he lays down inside his crib until his eyelids become heavy and drifts off to sleep.

Tommy was sleeping as well in his room where suddenly a bunch of sparkles were covering his body and slowly he was starting to disappear. Few moments later his body was gone leaving his crib empty. Meanwhile, at Angelica’s home she was sleeping soundly in her room until she started moving around in her bed looking groaning sounding like she was in pain. This discomfort made her kick her blanket off her body revealing her to be wearing only a large shirt that covers her whole body. Then her flat stomach started to expand and grow round while continuing to get bigger. This was causing her shirt to rise and reveal her bare dome of a belly where it was almost as big as her. After Angelica’s belly stopped growing her face face of discomfort turned into a more calm expression and even a smile forming on her face as well. She then placed her hands on her belly during her sleep and started rubbing all over before stopping and falling into a deep sleep. Hours pass and it became morning and that’s when...

info.brief_description: Girls and boys from various cartoons become preggers.
info.description:
As the message above says, girls from various shows become preggers. Let's not get too crazy with the dirty stuff. Mpreg is allowed, but only sometimes and if it's your thing.

Here are some extra rules with what is allowed:

Pregnancy
Belly inflation/inflation
Unbirthing
Long term pregnancies
Mpreg

Not allowed
Birthing (well you can have it but no detailed stuff)
Sex stuff
Diapiers
Popping
Death
Gore
Rape
Miscarriages
Abortion stuff
